title: Go back in Time
lyrics:
Hey you see that my story
Go back in time yeah
Ij-eobeoligo sip-eodo
Ijhyeojiji anhneun geol
Jal al-a jal al-a jal al-a Ay ay ay
Neon kkog gip-eun hyungteocheoleom

Salajiji anh-eul geol jal al-a jal al-a

Imi bad-a deul-in ji olae



Mogmalla mogmalla mogmalla

Neol bwado chaewojiji anhneun

Naega sideul-eo sideul-eo

Mogmalla mogmalla mogmalla

Nega jun salang-e nan jichidolog

Ta deul-eoga mogmalla

Lalalalalalala lalalalalala lalalalalala

I don’t matter what you do

Never forget me



Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Neowa na ibyeol-ui mun teog ap-e seo issneun sungan-e

Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Haluman jigeum idaelo meomchwo



Go back in time (Ay)

Sigan-eul geokkulo

Go back in time (Ay)

Sigan-eul geokkulo

(I just wanna love again)

Go back in time (Ay)

Sigan-eul geokkulo

Go back in time (Ay)

Sigan-eul geokkulo

(I just wanna love again)



Ulin gyesog meol-eojyeoman ga

What’s wrong

Nega nae ap-e eobs-eodo

Nan neol noh-ajuji moshae Babe Babe

Hyeonsil-e nun-eul gam-a

Jinan gieog sog-e salajyeo

Chochim solie nae du gwileul mag-a

May day May day



Mogmalla mogmalla mogmalla

Jiwodo beeoissneun gieog-e

Nan sideul-eo sideul-eo

Mogmalla mogmalla mogmalla

Gaseum-e sumgyeonwassdeon chueogdeul-eul

Chaeulsulog nunmul na

Lalalalalalala lalalalalala lalalalalala

I don’t matter what you do

Never forget me



Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Neowa na ibyeol-ui mun teog ap-e seo issneun sungan-e

Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Haluman jigeum idaelo meomchwo



Heunhadi heunhan ibyeol nolae gasacheoleom

Myeoch jul-e jeongliga swibge doeeoss-eumyeon

Ileohge deo apeujin anh-ass-eul tende gyesog

Nam-aiss-eo dasi pain pain



Yeah sigan-eul salojab-a

Like the monster

Guchaham-eul deohan jjijilham-eun ijen dwaess-eo

Got it? You, ije nae mal al-a deul-eo?

Dam-aduji anh-a ije nado baet-eonae



Go back in time



Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Neowa na ibyeol-ui mun teog ap-e seo issneun sungan-e

Tic tic tic dasi sigan-eul geokkulo

Haluman jigeum idaelo meomchwo



Go back in time (Ay) sigan-eul geokkulo

Go back in time (Ay) sigan-eul geokkulo

(I just wanna love again)

Go back in time (Ay) sigan-eul geokkulo

Go back in time (Ay) sigan-eul geokkulo

(I just wanna love again)
